title: Drawing, "Chest: Three Drawers within Curved Front Panel; Additional Three, Left Side; Rectangular Pulls,  Centered", September 30, 1933

inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: scale; [Deskey #] 7405; at lower left, K. 9/30/33. Inscribed in red color pencil at lower right, P.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Chest: Three Drawers within Curved Front Panel; Additional Three, Left Side; Rectangular Pulls,  Centered", September 30, 1933.
September 30, 1933. Graphite; red color pencil; ruled border in graphite
Tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1798.
